Texts.Eng: 'From the Twilight Halls we rose, and to them we shall all return.' ; Such was the wisdom the Elder of the Vyanit Clan imparted to me when I asked him why his people lived in such dark and poisonous places. His meaning was understood only after several weeks among his people.
